posts.title: Release of the Blog Creation Tool - 08/19/2023 by QAEZZ, The Consigliere
posts.content: Hello all, it is currently 5:08am. I have spent too long making this tool. Anyways, Admins now have a blog creation tool at their disposal. It is 100x easier than manually writing in the `posts.json` file. This tool is effect of manifesting my inner broke mentality. Instead of paying for hosting, or a DB, or any of that fancy (proper) shit... The Discord bot pushes a file change (posts.json) to the repo. Then whenever you load the site, JS looks in that file and renders the posts. It is now 5:12am. I can't English. Good night.. or Good morning? idk. piss off...

posts.title: New Blog Creation Tool - 8/29/2023 by QAEZZ, The Consigliere
posts.content:
Edited on: 8/30/2023
I've created a new blog creation tool for the Admins. It's publicly available at /admin. However, only Admins can post as it requires a GitHub Personal Access Token that has write privilege to the site's repo.
No Admin's token is logged nor stored. You can attempt to create a post, but if the access token is wrong/doesn't have write access, GitHub's API will throw an error. The JS is located at /js/createpost.js.
Here are the available endpoints for admins (*coming soonâ„¢): 

  /admin/createpost
  /admin/editpost
 */admin/removepost
